name: build-rapier
description: Build scripts for compatibility package with inlined webassembly as base64.

scripts.build-rust-2d-all: for f in non-deterministic deterministic simd; do FEATURE_TARGET=$f DIM_TARGET=2 npm run build-rust; done
scripts.build-rust-3d-all: for f in non-deterministic deterministic simd; do FEATURE_TARGET=$f DIM_TARGET=3 npm run build-rust; done
scripts.build-rust-all: npm run build-rust-2d-all && npm run build-rust-3d-all
scripts.build-feature: export FEATURE_TARGET=${FEATURE_TARGET} && export DIM_TARGET=${DIM_TARGET} && npm run clean &&  npm run build-rust && npm run build-genjs-feature && npm run build-js-feature && sh ./fix_raw_file.sh
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-rust-all && sh ./gen_src.sh && npm run build-js && sh ./fix_raw_file.sh
